metadata.title: Houndstooth Velvet Lapel Men Suits - Premium 3 Pieces Grid Plaid Slim Fit Check Tuxedo Black Velvet Shawl Lapel Wedding Suits
features: SUITS MATERIAL: White and Black Grid Plaid with black valvet lapel Fabric.soft and comfortable, absorbent,good air permeability which can reduce skin irritation ,easy to be washed.

SUITS JACKET: Houndstooth Black Velvet Shawl Lapel Single Breasted One Button Closure Blazer Coat Jacket.Chest Pocket for Handkerchief Use, Soft Shoulder Pad for A Natural Shape,Two Flap Pockets,Four Sleeve Buttons Each Side.
SUIT VEST/WAISTCOAT: Houndstooth Vest,3 Buttons Closure and Two Welt pocket suits waistcoat;You can Wear it with this Suit or Match it with any other jacket Coat or Tux Shirt You Like.
SUIT PANT: Houndstooth Flat Front Free Length Pants Come with Slanted Side Pockets Suit Pant.
Package includes:Jacket + Vest + Pants .Elegant 3-Pieces Suits, Perfect for many occasions,such as wedding,party,anniversary,prom,business.Good Gift Choice to Your Father,Friend or Boyfriend!
